short_description: This function estimates the number of distinct values.
long_description: This function estimates the number of distinct values in a column or combinations of columns, while scanning the table only once.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input data.

argument_clauses.name: InputColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the columns for which to estimate the number of distinct values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the columns for which to estimate the number of distinct values.

argument_clauses.name: ErrorRate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the acceptable error rate, expressed as a decimal (for example, if error_tolerance is 10, then the acceptable error rate is 10%). The error_tolerance must be in the range (5.0E-4, 10]. The default value is 10.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the acceptable error rate, expressed as a decimal (for example, if error_tolerance is 10, then the acceptable error rate is 10%). The error_tolerance must be in the range (5.0E-4, 10]. The default value is 10.
